name: react-thumbnail
description: Create thumbnails of elements or websites

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd:min: NODE_ENV=production && COMPRESS=1 && webpack src/index.js dist/react-thumbnail.min.js --config webpack.config.production.js
scripts.build:example: NODE_ENV='production' && mkdir -p example-dist/static && cd example && webpack index.js -p --devtool source-map && cp -a dist/ ../example-dist/static/ && cp index.html ../example-dist/
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run lint
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.publish:example: npm run clean:example && npm run build:example && cd example-dist && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update Example' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update example' && git push git@github.com:FWeinb/react-thumbnail gh-pages --force

author: Fabrice Weinberg <Fabrice@weinberg.me>
